attributes.action: Object To MP's Spending Half A Billion Building Temp Accommodation
attributes.background: It is outrageous MP's spending Public money on this.  Why not the House of Lords, Portcullis House, or temp structures in the Treasury Courtyards, Foreign Office, Church House and the Emmanuel Centre. Or why not Birmingham or Manchester, in the interim.  Please sign and stop this nonsense!

rejection.details: You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
